document_data.name: Obsidian Gargoyle
document_data.mainbody: '''Obsidian gargoyles''' were a variant of [[gargoyle]]s originating from the [[Elemental Chaos]]<ref>{{Cite dragon/423/Ecology of the Gargoyle|11}}<ref> that had jagged bodies of [[obsidian]] and were selectively bred by cultists of the [[Elder Elemental Eye]] to be loyal servants willing to give their lives for their masters.
document_data.Combat: These gargoyles fought in the same manner as their more common kin, but due to the jagged edges across their bodies it was far more difficult and hazardous to escape from one's grasp.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], obsidian gargoyles could be found within [[Mount Hotenow]].
